Config - Class in cinemabooking.config
This class encapsulates all application preferences
Config() - Constructor for class cinemabooking.config.Config
Create preferences instance and load config class, changing node name here will affect all config classes.
config - Variable in class cinemabooking.Database
The type of Database: mysql/mssql/local
configSet - Variable in class cinemabooking.config.DatabaseConfig
Whether settings have been set
connect() - Method in class cinemabooking.Database
Connects to the database using the saved settings from Config Class if no preferences are found then the connection is reverted to a local db.
connection - Variable in class cinemabooking.Database

connectionUrl - Variable in class cinemabooking.Database
